pullrequest.title: Move the camera to canonical angles

content.raw:
I am seeing some occasional test failures

~~~
********* Start testing of ViewAngleWidget_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : ViewAngleWidget_TEST::initTestCase()
FAIL!  : ViewAngleWidget_TEST::EmptyWorld() '(pose.pos - gazebo::math::Vector3(0, -dist, 0)).GetLength() < tol' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo5/gazebo/gui/ViewAngleWidget_TEST.cc(170)]
SharePercentChange[0.979613] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[2.14987]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
SharePercentChange[0.0305582] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[0.336948]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
PASS   : ViewAngleWidget_TEST::Projections()
PASS   : ViewAngleWidget_TEST::cleanupTestCase()
Totals: 3 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
~~~

Doesn't always happen though.
